mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict (dictcd, fildcd, fildvl, desctx, seq) values (#{dictcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fildcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fildvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desctx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into sys_dict
dictcd,
fildcd,
fildvl,
desctx,
seq,
